name: Miso Ramen
comment: FAKE. RAMEN. If you are going to waste your money eating ramen in North America, just buy a plane ticket to Japan.

name: Angus Burger
comment: If you would like to get heartattck in near future, this burger will be perfect for you.

name: A5 Kobe Ribeye Steak
comment: 880 dollars for 16ox Ribeye Steak. Now I am sturggling to pay my rent. Totally worth it.
